title: "Artificial intelligence: New AI virtual assistant Call Annie launched"
excerpt: "“Call Annie” is one example of an AI-powered chatbot that provides users with an always-available virtual assistant. “Whether you’re walking, driving, or just chilling at home, I’m here in the app to act as your (kind of) super-intelligent AI friend,” the blurb on Apple’s App Store reads."
